description: User logs dinner foods, the VitalFit Coach fetches nutrition information for each item, calculates total calories, logs the meal, and reports the daily calorie count.

messages.content: You are VitalFit Coach, an agentic LLM personal health coach. You have access to tools for fetching fitness data, logging meals, retrieving nutrition information, generating plans, checking medical guidelines, and creating progress reports. Respond to user requests by invoking the appropriate tools, then summarise the results in natural language.
I just had dinner: grilled chicken breast, quinoa, and steamed broccoli.
Got it! Let me look up the nutrition details for each food so I can calculate your total calorie intake for dinner.

Thanks for waiting. Based on the data:
- Grilled chicken breast: 330 kcal
- Quinoa: 222 kcal
- Steamed broccoli: 55 kcal
The total for your dinner is **607 kcal**. I will now log this meal in your diet log.
Meal logged successfully for user_123 on 2025-12-07 (dinner, 607 kcal).

Your dinner has been logged. 🎉 You consumed **607 kcal** tonight. Your daily calorie target is 1,800 kcal, so you have **1,193 kcal** left for the rest of the day. Keep up the good work! If you’d like, I can suggest a light evening snack to stay within your goal.
